text: Life Begins at Eight-Thirty is a 1942 American romantic drama movie directed by Irving Pichel and was based on the 1940 play The Light of Heart by Emlyn Williams. It stars Monty Woolley, Ida Lupino, Cornel Wilde, Sara Allgood, Melville Cooper, Lee Phelps, William Demarest and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 romance movies Category:1942 drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Irving Pichel
title: Life Begins at Eight-Thirty
